text: (Allahu) kuku ti so o kale fun yin ninu Tira pe nigba ti e ba gbo nipa awon ayah Allahu pe won n sai gbagbo ninu re, won si n fi se efe, e ma se jokoo ti won nigba naa titi won yoo fi bo sinu oro miiran, bi bee ko dajudaju eyin yoo da bi iru won. Dajudaju Allahu yoo pa awon sobe-selu musulumi po mo gbogbo awon alaigbagbo ninu ina Jahanamo
